attributes.action: Ignore the petition calling him to cancel the Ł12 billion roadbuilding programme, and INCREASE the length of motorways even further
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public transport TOO emits CO2. The difference between it and cars is that non-CO2 emitting cars are becoming more common everyday, while buses, trains and trams continue to pollute the environment. Besides, roads are what made us a politically free nation - because we are able to travel anywhere, not just where railway line lead.
